title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 39 - Minimum Standards For The New York State Partnership For Long-term Care Program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 39 - Minimum Standards For The New York State Partnership For Long-term Care Program

State Regulations
§ 39.0 - Preamble
§ 39.1 - Approval of qualified policies/certificates under the program
§ 39.2 - General conditions governing the program
§ 39.3 - Minimum benefit standards for qualified policies/certificates for the 3/6/50 plan design
§ 39.4 - Minimum benefit standards for qualified policies/certificates for the 1.5/3/50 plan design
§ 39.5 - Minimum benefit standards for qualified policies/certificates for the 4/4/100 plan design
§ 39.6 - Minimum benefit standards for qualified policies/certificates for the 2/2/100 plan design
§ 39.7 - Minimum benefit standards for qualified policies/certificates for the 2/4/50 plan design
§ 39.8 - Disclosure explaining insurance regulatory issues and medicaid asset protection issues when covered under new york state partnership insurance or covered under partnership insurance of other states after replacement

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 39

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§ 201, 301, 1117, 3201, 3217, 3221, 3229, 4235, 4237; art. 43; Social Services Law, §367-f; Financial Services Law, §§ 202, 301, 302

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
